module.name: consentmanager
module.description: Become GDPR & CCPA-compliant with our Consent Management Provider (CMP) software for websites. Ask your website visitors for consent for GDPR/Cookies. The Cookie-Crawler will detect all Cookies on your website. 30 Languages, Your own Logo/Design, many Reports, integrated A/B-Testing. Try now for free!
module.author: consentmanager.net
